title: Research
text: From a young age, the potential of research to improve lives through technology has captivated me. In this section, explore my publications, each marking a step in my journey of discovery and innovation. Join me in delving into the diverse realms of research that continue to inspire and drive me.

title: Teaching
text: Teaching is more than a profession to me; it’s a calling. Here, discover my works on innovative education, reflecting my commitment to nurturing a love of learning and belief in education’s transformative power. Explore my world, where every lesson is a journey and every student holds boundless potential.

title: Aleix Alcacer Sales
text:
I am a passionate predoctoral researcher at Jaume I University, deeply immersed in the vibrant world of Open Source. My enthusiasm lies in developing innovative algorithms, with a keen focus on optimizing both performance and efficiency.
At present, my research endeavors are centered around crafting novel methods in the fascinating field of archetypal analysis.
View my complete CV.

title: Aleix Alcacer Sales

title: Open Source Projects
